markdownRemark.excerpt: I recently spent 2.5 days in Seoul and 1.5 days in Tokyo on an impromptu vacation. Had the time of my life, and was blown away by how much…
markdownRemark.html:
I recently spent 2.5 days in Seoul and 1.5 days in Tokyo on an impromptu vacation. Had the time of my life, and was blown away by how much more modern the cities feel (particularly Seoul) and how different their cultures are from America. Tokyo in particular blew my mind, and I’ve decided that I need to live there at some point in my life (I’m a bit biased because I can speak the language though).

Here’s a video of my trip: Jeremy goes to Seoul, South Korea (Youtube).

Also wrote a post about my trip on Medium, check it out here: A Weekend in Seoul and Tokyo.

frontmatter.title: A Weekend in Seoul and Tokyo
